meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Jon McGuire Blake Perkins Sarah McNitt Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #6756.

td.p: Jon McGuire, a software development manager from Matthews, North Carolina
Blake Perkins, an environmental scientist from Baton Rouge, Louisiana
Sarah McNitt, a study-abroad advisor originally from Ann Arbor, Michigan (whose 4-day cash winnings total $69,199)

tr.td: WORD PUZZLES
1970s NO. 1 HITS
DESCRIBING THE ANIMAL
TEEING OFF
CHIPPING IN
LET'S PLAY SOME GULF
